.code-gallery-table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  table-layout: fixed;
}

.code-gallery-table th,
.code-gallery-table td {
  padding: 0.65rem 0.8rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
  vertical-align: middle;
}

.code-gallery-table th {
  text-align: left;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Title column */
.code-gallery-table th:nth-child(1),
.code-gallery-table td:nth-child(1) {
  width: 42%;
}

.code-gallery-table td:nth-child(1) {
  white-space: normal;
  word-break: break-word;
}

/* Preview + download columns */
.code-gallery-table td:nth-child(n+3),
.code-gallery-table th:nth-child(n+3) {
  text-align: center;
  width: 6rem;
}
